<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Thrasfyr](/Monsters.aspx?ID=824)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

As bizarre in appearance as they are ferocious, thrasfyrs resemble six-limbed bears with bull-like horns, draconic scales, and a fire-breathing serpent for a tail. Every thrasfyr is wrapped in animated chains psychically linked to the creature's mind.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Thrasfyr.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Thrasfyr](/Monsters.aspx?ID=824)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Tane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=312" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +5

**Con** +9

**Int** -3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Planar Acclimation** The thrasfyr always treats the plane it is located on as its home plane.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +35 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +27 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 350

, regeneration 25 (deactivated by acid or cold)

**Immunities**
fire

**Resistances**
physical 15 (except cold iron)

**Weaknesses**
cold 15, cold iron 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 40 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
chain +34 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+17 bludgeoning plus [Improved Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=28)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +32 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+15 piercing plus 3d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+15 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horn +32 ([fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+15 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 37
- **9th**
[Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) (self and rider only)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
- **Constant (4th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The thrasfyr's serpent tail breathes a blast of flame in a 50-foot cone, dealing 10d12 fire damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

**Rider's Bond** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The thrasfyr designates one creature as its rider by touching the rider with its claw. The thrasfyr and rider can communicate with each other telepathically at any range on the same plane and are aware of each other's present state, direction from each other, distance from each other, and any conditions affecting either.

**Tangling Chains** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The thrasfyr thrashes its chains in all directions. Each creature in a 15-foot emanation takes 18d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 38 basic Reflex save); creatures that fail are [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until the start of the thrasfyr's next turn. The thrasfyr can't use Tangling Chains or make chain Strikes for 1d4 rounds.

**Whirling Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The thrasfyr makes a jaws Strike, a horn Strike, and two claw Strikes, each against a different target. Each attack counts toward the thrasfyr's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

</column>
name: Thrasfyr
